content: April 1 NextEra Energy Inc's $4.3 billion plan to buy Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc has made solar companies uneasy  worried that the deal would reverse the island state's push to decentralize its power grid.
name: Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc
title: NextEra's Hawaii deal faces big concerns from solar players
